title: tikv cannot start when open titan
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
./tikv-server -V
 TiKV 
Release Version:   6.2.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   23588581613251bdec283764a604197dd00ca377
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.2.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2022-07-14 11:03:14
Rust Version:      rustc 1.62.0-nightly (7c4b47696 2022-04-30)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
1、open titan
2、run workload
3、restart one tikv
4、tikv cannot start after restarting tikv（upgrade image which include the pr commit pipeline write）

### What did you expect?
tikv can start when open titan

### What did happened?
"namespace":"glh-master-57b58","level":"FATAL","pod":"tc-tikv-0","container":"tikv","log":"[[lib.rs:494](http://lib.rs:494/)] [\"failed to write to engine: Engine(\\\"Not implemented: \\\")\"] std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}\\n             at comments_data.body:
@tonyxuqqi: Closing this issue.

<details>

In response to [this](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/issues/13038#issuecomment-1189722188):

>/close


Instructions for interacting with me using PR comments are available [here](https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/guide/pull-requests.md).  If you have questions or suggestions related to my behavior, please file an issue against the [kubernetes/test-infra](https://github.com/kubernetes/test-infra/issues/new?title=Prow%20issue:) repository.
</details>
